manager.datamanager

Class SearchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.datamanager.AbstractManager
      • manager.datamanager.SearchManager

  • public class SearchManager
extends AbstractManager
    A manager that handle the Search Command. It is also used to enable the referencing of tasks by its relative ID.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SearchManager(TaskData taskData)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchManager

        public SearchManager(TaskData taskData)

    • Method Detail

      • searchTasks

        public Result searchTasks(Filter[] filters)
        Search for tasks based on a set of filters. If a TaskInfo spans more than one day, it will be split into multiple TaskInfo spanning one day each.
        Parameters:
        filters - The filters that is used in the search.
        Returns:
        A SearchResult that contains the tasks that match the filters.

      • searchTasksWithoutSplit

        public Result searchTasksWithoutSplit(Filter[] filters)
        Search for tasks based on a set of filters. In contrast with searchTasks, this method does not split TaskInfo.
        Parameters:
        filters - The filters that is used in the search.
        Returns:
        A SearchResult that contains the tasks that match the filters.

      • getLastSearchResult

        public SearchResult getLastSearchResult()
        Get the SearchResult of the last search operation.
        Returns:
        The last SearchResult

      • details

        public Result details(TaskIdSet taskIdSet)
        Get the DetailsResult of the TaskIdSet.
        Parameters:
        taskIdSet - The TaskIdSet that contains the TaskId of the tasks that we want to search for.
        Returns:
        The DetailsResult.

      • getAbsoluteIndex

        public TaskId getAbsoluteIndex(int relativeIndex)
        Convert a relative index to an absolute index.
        Parameters:
        relativeIndex - A relative index of a task.
        Returns:
        The corresponding absolute index of the relative index.

      • getTaskInfo

        public TaskInfo getTaskInfo(int relativeIndex)
        Get a TaskInfo, given its relative index.
        Parameters:
        relativeIndex - The index.
        Returns:
        The TaskInfo.

      • getTaskInfo

        public TaskInfo getTaskInfo(TaskId taskId)
        Get a TaskInfo, given its absolute index.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The absolute index.
        Returns:
        The TaskInfo.
